import styles from "../css/ScoreBoard.module.css"; import { Table } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const ScoreBoard = (props) => { // 전광판 const { scores, R, H, B, gameLog, homeLogo, awayLogo } = props; const logos = useSelector((state) => state.logo.logos); return ( <>

{scores[0]} {scores[2]} {scores[4]} {scores[6]} {scores[8]} {scores[10]} {scores[12]} {scores[14]} {scores[16]} {R[0]} {H[0]} {B[0]}
{scores[1]} {scores[3]} {scores[5]} {scores[7]} {scores[9]} {scores[11]} {scores[13]} {scores[15]} {scores[17]} {R[1]} {H[1]} {B[1]}
); }; export default ScoreBoard;
